DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Internal Fixation Femoral Neck Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: Two implant system mainly use internal fixation : canulate screw plate-screw-systems . Regarding latter , dynamic hip screw system ( DHS ) represent frequently use device . Targon FN ( Aesculap ) new plate-screw system available market since 2007 . In contrast DHS , use one telescrew , Targon FN provide four telescrews . With registry , want evaluate result Targon FN compare DHS system .
